title: Mouse won't work in game
body:
My mouse works just fine in the launcher, but the second I get in game it can't click anything.
It can hover around the screen, but can't left/right click anything, so I can't move, buy or attack.
I tried to change the binds to keyboard keys, but that doesn't seem to work either.
Does anyone else experience this issue? I couldn't find any solution online.

replies.body:
This could be happening for a variety of reasons like corrupt configurations especially if modifications were made, or even a bad hardware.  My suggestions would be to first use another mouse/keyboard to rule out hardware possibilities.  If that doesn't work, try resetting your config though keep in mind you'll have to redo your bindings:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

I hope that helps!
